title: 7.5.3 Implement ComplianceDataLoader
body:
## Parent Issue
#33 - 7.5 Compliance Framework Mapping

## Objective
Implement YAML loader that populates database on startup.

## Features
- Load all framework YAML files
- Create domain/control hierarchy
- Create rule mappings
- Idempotent loading (safe to re-run)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/compliance/loader.py`

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
